## Bio:

Hi! My name is Ria Narayanan and I am a senior at UT Austin studying Statistics and Data Sciences with a major in Entrepreneurship. I am interested in the intersection of business and technology. My experience includes being an SDE intern at Amazon this past summer, a rotational intern at KPMG Summer 2024, and a business analyst intern at Working Solutions Summer 2023. I am very excited for the school year.


Welcome to my website!
